cab.content: of22812B ATT US SITUATION - EVENING - 20th JULY, 1918.1. Vjggggjj FRONT.(a) French Front.According to information received this morning theFrench counter attacks on the Eastern and Western sides of the CHATEAU THIERRY salient ape making good progress, but owing to interruption of telephonic communication between England and France no details have been received of the most recent news,The situation at 10 a.nu was as follows;- In the sector between REIMS and CHATEAU THIERRY, MARFAUX has been captured by British troops. South of the MaRNS the French have taken the BOIS DE MISY and were reported to be advancing towards MRSUIULE-PORT and PGRT-A-BINSON. It was also reported that the French had probably taken TROISSY.On the CHATEAU-THIERRY - SOISSONS front the French have made progress North and South of the OURCQ, and have advanced their line as follows:* MONT CHEVILLOM (2,000 metres South West of OULCHY) BOIS DE LUD - GERBMESNIL FARM - X FLBSSIER HELBU o(b) Britiah Front.The situation is unchanged.2. ITALIAN AKP MACEDONIAN FRONTS.There is nothing special to report.General staff,War Office, S,W,1. 2Qth July, 1918,Issued at 6,40 p,m.
